data.title: Apple Intelligence Has a Long Way to Go to Match Its Marketing Hype
data.meta_description: The first preview of Apple Intelligence for developers shows just how far the company has to go to live up to the hype. Also: Apple reshuffles its design team leadership; expect the iPhone 16 before Apple Intelligence; and the company returns to revenue growth.
data.text:
The first preview of Apple Intelligence for developers shows just how far the company has to go to live up to the hype. Also: Apple reshuffles its design team leadership; expect the iPhone 16 before Apple Intelligence; and the company returns to revenue growth.

Last time in Power On: The Apple Watch is getting bigger screens but a similar look.
